coredata.dc:title: Multi-agent strategic modeling in a robotic soccer domain
coredata.prism:publicationName: Proceedings of the International Conference on Autonomous Agents

abstract.ce:para: This paper presents an algorithm for multi-agent strategic modeling (MASM) applied in a robotic soccer domain. It transforms a multi-agent action sequence into a set of strategic action descriptions in a graphical and symbolic form. By using hierarchically ordered domain knowledge, the algorithm is able to generate graphic and symbolic strategic action descriptions together with corresponding rules at different levels of abstraction. The method was evaluated on the RoboCup Soccer Server Internet League data. Copyright 2006 ACM.

item-info.copyright: Copyright 2011 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.

The method was evaluated on the RoboCup Soccer Server Internet League data. Copyright 2006 ACM.
